SELECT IFNULL(B.QANTN_DIV, '0') AS QUARANTINE_DIV , CASE WHEN IFNULL(A.LOGIN_ID, '') <> '' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS REGISTER_YN FROM PATIENT A LEFT OUTER JOIN admission B ON A.PATIENT_ID = B.PATIENT_ID AND B.ADMISSION_DATE <= NOW() AND B.DSCHGE_DATE IS NULL AND B.DEL_YN = 'N' WHERE A.PATIENT_NM = #{patientNm} AND A.BIRTH_DATE = #{birthDate} AND A.SEX = #{sex} AND A.CELL_PHONE = #{cellPhone}
